CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Violation_Type__c))),
IF(
ISPICKVAL($User.TimeZoneSidKey, 'America/New_York'),
TEXT(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate-5/24)) & ' ' & MID(TEXT(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate-5/24)), FIND(TEXT(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate-5/24)),':'), 2) & ':' & MID( TEXT(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate-5/24)) , FIND(TEXT(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate-5/24)),':')+4, 2) & ':' & MID( TEXT(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate-5/24)) , FIND(TEXT(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate-5/24)),':')+7, 2),
IF(
ISPICKVAL($User.TimeZoneSidKey, 'America/Los_Angeles'),
TEXT(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate-8/24)) & ' ' & MID(TEXT(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate-8/24)), FIND(TEXT(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate-8/24)),':'), 2) & ':' & MID( TEXT(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate-8/24)) , FIND(TEXT(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate-8/24)),':')+4, 2),
TEXT(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate-5/24)) & ' ' & MID(TEXT(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate-5/24)), FIND(TEXT(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate-5/24)),':'), 2) & ':' & MID( TEXT(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate-5/24)) , FIND(TEXT(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate-5/24)),':')+4, 2))
), '' )
CustomField.label: Omni Created Date & Time
